concept.title:
Poetry,
and fragments of text
concept.shortdesc: The lines element is used for content where the line breaks are important to the meaning of the text.

conbody.p: The lines element may be used to represent character , and text fragments where the line breaks can be considered to be part of the content. A good example of the lines element is to describe a poem.
A processor will treat line-end characters within a lines element to be part of the data; normally, for most other elements, line-end characters are ignored.
The lines element is similar to the pre element in HTML.
